text: @realDonaldTrump You same sick racist that called for Central Park Five execution although they were innocent you don’t care abut George Floyd is obvious you trying to distract from your willful disregard to US health, wealth & safety COVID-19 suppressor criminal you belong in a jailhouse not WH.
